FavoriteItem.description: Represents a favorite search item. This contains the core data for a saved trade query.

id.description: The unique key for the trade search result. This value is the key returned by the POE2 trade page API for a specific search query.

name.description: The name of the favorite, typically representing the saved search query.

region.description: The region code for the POE2 trade page. Must be one of the defined TradeRegion values.

type.description: The type of the entity. Always 'item' for favorite items.

SimplifiedEntry.description: A simplified entry that can be either a folder for an organization or a favorite item.

SimplifiedFolder.description: Represents a folder used to organize favorite items. It can contain other favorite items or subfolders.

children.description: An array of child entries (favorite items or subfolders) contained within this folder.

type.description: The type of the entity. Always 'folder' for folders.

TradeRegion.description: Defines the set of possible POE2 trade page regions based on server hostnames.
